title: Trent Alexander-Arnold lands first assist in Real Madrid shirt following transfer from Liverpool (Video)
description: The time Trent Alexander-Arnold spent at Liverpool was marked by numerous pin-point assists, and the England international continues in the same style for Real Madrid. His cross was headed in by Gonzalo Garcia as Real beat Juventus in the FIFA Club World Cup round of 16. html:
The time Trent Alexander-Arnold spent at Liverpool was marked by numerous pin-point assists, and the England international continues in the same style for Real Madrid.

His cross was headed in by Gonzalo Garcia as Real beat Juventus in the FIFA Club World Cup round of 16.
